wadidura wisthara galla bandhanagara adhikari jagath chandana wirasinha mahathage sankalpayak anuwa pasal sisu daruwan mathdrawya uwadurin mudawa ganime aramunin pawathwanu labana noya yuthu thana pasal sisun danuwath kirime wadasatahana ithama kalochitha arthawath wadasatahanak bawath, galla bandhanagara adhikarithuma athulu kandayama siya wagakimen obbata yamin me sidu karana samaja mehewara galla nagaraye palamu purawasiya washayen thaman itha agaya kota salakana bawath galla mahanagara sabhawe nagaradhipathi priyantha sahabandu mathithuma prakasha karana ladi.wadidura wisthara bussa bandhanagara hindu newasikayange dipawali samarum awasthawa bussa bandhanagara hindu kowiledi 07 da pawathwini.
thaththa thamayi mawa lasthi karanne podi kale.
ohuge asurath samangama mata ohu asuru kala thawath kipadenakuge da asura labina.

(mema iranamata goduruwi athi mahathmiyage wisthara dana ganimata kamathi parithyagashilin hata ema thorathuru thanapathi karyalaye kamkaru subhasadhana anshayen laba gatha haki athara, aya pilibanda thorathuru anthar jalaye ho wenath prasiddha madhya thulin pala nokarana lesa aya illa athi bawin, ese nokarana men illa sitinu labe.)

hinnonmadaya wardhanaya wime balawathma awadhanama nam mema aabadhaya sahitha palamu wani math raye gnyathiyaku (le gnyathiyaku) sitima (6.5 % ka awadhanamak) menma, hinnonmadaya sahitha eekandaja nimbaullun sitimen 40 % kata wada wadi balapamakda atha.
